content.description: A company claims that each bag of grass seed that it sells contains the following distribution of grass-seed types.
content.question: Type of Grass Seed Percent Fescue (F) 55% Buffalo grass (B) 22% Blue grama (BG) 10% Indian grass (I) 7% Green needlegrass (NG) 6% A quality control specialist tests samples of the seed being packaged and uses a chi-square goodness-of-fit test to see whether the proportions in the samples match what is claimed by the company. Which of the following best describes the null hypothesis and the alternative hypothesis for the test?

choices.label: <math alttext="H sub 0: p equals 0.20. H sub a: p is not equal to 0.20" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mo>⁢</mo><mtext> </mtext><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.20</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mtext> </mtext><mo>⁢</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>0.20</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: p sub F equals 0.20, p sub B equals 0.20, p sub B G equals 0.20, p sub I equals 0.20, p sub N G equals 0.20. H sub a: at least one of the proportions is different." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtable columnalign="left" width="auto"><mtr><mtd><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mtext> </mtext><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.20</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.20</mn><mo>,</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>G</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.20</mn><mo>,</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.20</mn><mo>,</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>N</mi><mi>G</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.20</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mtext> At least o</mtext><mtext>ne of the proportions is different</mtext><mn>.</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: p sub F equals 0.55, p sub B equals 0.22, p sub B G equals 0.10, p sub I equals 0.07, p sub N G equals 0.06. H sub a: At least one of the proportions is different." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtable columnalign="left" width="auto"><mtr><mtd><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mtext> </mtext><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.55</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.22</mn><mo>,</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>G</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.10</mn><mo>,</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.07</mn><mo>,</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>N</mi><mi>G</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.06</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mtext> At least o</mtext><mtext>ne of the proportions is different</mtext><mn>.</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: All proportions are equally likely. H sub a: All of the proportions are different." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left" width="auto"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mtext>All proportions are equally likely.</mtext></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mtext>All of the proportions are different.</mtext></mtd></mtr></mtable><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: There is no association between the grass-seed types. H sub a: There is an association between the grass-seed types." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtable columnalign="left" width="auto"><mtr><mtd><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mtext>There is no association between the grass-seed types.</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mtext>There is an association between the grass-seed types.</mtext></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="H sub 0: p sub F equals 0.55, p sub B equals 0.22, p sub B G equals 0.10, p sub I equals 0.07, p sub N G equals 0.06. H sub a: At least one of the proportions is different." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtable columnalign="left" width="auto"><mtr><mtd><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mtext> </mtext><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.55</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.22</mn><mo>,</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>G</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.10</mn><mo>,</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.07</mn><mo>,</mo><msub><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>N</mi><mi>G</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.06</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mtext> At least o</mtext><mtext>ne of the proportions is different</mtext><mn>.</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></math>

topic.text: 8.2: Setting up a Chi-Square Goodness of Fit Test

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Identify null and alternative hypotheses.
